Time: 2023-03-17 18:05:53
SUBJECT: I am Mr. Gray Stan, the Powerb
I am Mr. Gray Stan, the Powerball agent assigned to your case.
Wish to Congratulate you on your victory, you are one of the lucky
winners of this season.
Get back to us for more details.
Once again Congratulation
Regards,
Mr. Gray Stan
From: p***********6@gmail.com
To: wh67906@m**************m
Time: 2023-03-17 18:39:26
SUBJECT: 
Dear Mr, Thosmas
We are happy to announce to you that you are one of the lucky people to
Win this Powerball jackpot. Your email address was chosen in this quarter
from our new Powerball software promotion that
randomly selects email addresses from the web from which winners are
selected.  You are required to forward the following details to help
facilitate the processing of your claims and certificate to enable the
release of your winnings.
1. Full names.
2. Residential address.
3. Phone number.
4. Fax number.
5. Occupation.
6. Sex.
7. Age.
8. Nationality.
You are advised to forward this information as soon as possible to enable
us to attend to your file.Please note that your funds have been deposited
safely
in our online banking. and your information will be forwarded
to them before they can release your winnings.  After you have sent down
this information, a certificate will be prepared for you. As a
proof of winning from this office to the payment center before they
release your funds.no one will ask you to pay for any fees on the office
because our job is to inform the winner and give them there certificate
and your winning amount will be attach on the certificate as well,
You are advised to keep your victory to yourself
to avoid unscripulous elements from taking advantage of the situation.
Once again Congratulation
Regards,
Mr. Gray Stan

Regards,

conversations.subject: SUBJECT:
conversations.body:
Dear Mr, Thosmas
We are happy to announce to you that you are one of the lucky people to
Win this Powerball jackpot. Your email address was chosen in this quarter
from our new Powerball software promotion that
randomly selects email addresses from the web from which winners are
selected.  You are required to forward the following details to help
facilitate the processing of your claims and certificate to enable the
release of your winnings.
1. Full names.
2. Residential address.
3. Phone number.
4. Fax number.
5. Occupation.
6. Sex.
7. Age.
8. Nationality.
You are advised to forward this information as soon as possible to enable
us to attend to your file.Please note that your funds have been deposited
safely
in our online banking. and your information will be forwarded
to them before they can release your winnings.  After you have sent down
this information, a certificate will be prepared for you. As a
proof of winning from this office to the payment center before they
release your funds.no one will ask you to pay for any fees on the office
because our job is to inform the winner and give them there certificate
and your winning amount will be attach on the certificate as well,
You are advised to keep your victory to yourself
to avoid unscripulous elements from taking advantage of the situation.
Once again Congratulation
Regards,
Mr. Gray Stan
